ANU.name: Judy  Harrison
expertise: Legal Practice Lawyering And The Legal Profession
Legal Institutions Incl. Courts And Justice Systems
Humanities And Social Sciences Curriculum And Pedagogy Excl. Economics Business And Management
interest: Domestic and family violence law and policy, legal empowerment, cause lawyering, access to justice, law reform, law and development, lawyering and development, legal practice, clinical legal education, law and justice monitoring and evaluation.
project: Judy is currently researching around lawyering, pro-poor development and social justice outcomes, particularly regarding models for grassroots lawyering and legal services. In 2014 Judy is based in Kununurra, Western Australia.
